Nemesis Enforcer:

::Nemesis takes out his laser pistol, looking inside the CR chamber::
<Zardus, he's awake I'm bringing him to you now>
::Opening the CR chamber, Nemesis pulls out his energon blade and aims his 
pistol at Wolfgang's face, the blade lightly touching Wolfgang's chest::
"Try anything and you die, cooperate and Zardus may show leniancy."
::Nemesis gets behind Wolfgang, moving his gun to push against the back of 
Wolfgang's head, the blade against his back::
"Now, move!"
(For now, I'm taking it that they head to Zardus, unless anything otherwise 
is posted)
